name: Secretary of State Game
description:
In this game you take on the role of a lone spy when you are tasked with infiltrating the office of Grand Master Michal Kozpinski, trying to uncover the truth behind the mysterious disappearance of the daughter of his former boss, Vladimir Kozpinski.
In this twist on spy games, you rub shoulders with professional intelligence agents, get caught by the boss, and have to solve a series of puzzles before the boss can take you on. You won't be dropping your position any time soon, though... [Or you can add our own WTF quotes to the comments section at the bottom of the screen.] RPG Game Packed with Features Decent graphics Beautiful modern 3D characters Fully direct voice-acted dialogue Tons of unlockable tasks and mini-games The unique style of 'Sonic the Hedgehog'-style styled mini-games Coup de Grace mode where you're hired to murder Muton the demon (you'll be asked) The coolest in game music The best part is that it's free! ( so you can play it all the time!) Buy it from our store! More Outhouse Games are coming! More games are coming! New content will be added as we continue to release content from the Outhouse Media publishing line!
